alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 11 at 8:48PM MST until September 11 at 9:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 930 PM MST. * At 848 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near San Tan Valley, or 10 miles southwest of Gold Canyon, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mesa, Apache Junction, Gold Canyon, Queen Creek, Blackwater, Gold Camp, San Tan Mountain Park, Magma and San Tan Valley. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 194 and 210. AZ Route 202 between mile markers 32 and 35. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
